attributes.action: Give the British people the veto on the terms of the Brexit deal
attributes.additional_details: Any referendum on the terms should be before Article 50 is triggered. The British people deserve the right to approve those terms
attributes.background: The main points of the Leave campaign have been on immigration and the cost of Britain's contribution to the EU budget. Should the terms of the negotiated leave settlement include freedom of movement and a contribution to the EU budget. Why have we left the EU?
